basics.name: Aslam Hafizuddin
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: I'm a full stack developer based in Tangerang, Indonesia. with 7 years development experience and I'm passionate about building delightful experiences for the web and mobile. I'm also an amateur trekker, and I love exploring the mountains.

work.summary: Developed Livestock management system. focusing on farm-to-farm operations and enhancing the user experience for farmer, worker, veterinarian and consumers.
highlights: Accountable for overseeing the daily progress and reporting of developers under my supervision.
Responsible for the design and user experience aspects of the developed applications.
Engaged in the enhancement and refinement of pre-existing business logic to optimize operational efficiency and efficacy.

work.summary: Developed a portal system for client needs. Conducted technical analysis to assess costs and client requirements, managed two mid-level developers to complete the project.
highlights: Engaged in technical discussions with the Tech Lead regarding the framework selected for application development.
Facilitated direct communication with Project Managers to thoroughly understand and address user needs and requirements.
Provided guidance and mentorship to developers to ensure comprehensive understanding and adoption of the new framework proposed for the upcoming project.

work.summary: Developed systems for traders to effectively monitor and analyze their trading activities, Kitchen management and software-as-a-service (SaaS) applications.
highlights: Direct interacted with users to understand their business needs and collaborate on development initiatives.
Responsible for evaluating and choosing appropriate technologies to be utilized for project development.

work.summary: Oversaw integration development with third-party vendors, established GitHub repositories and facilitated team connectivity, and collaborated with developers to optimize business workflow enhancements.
highlights: Responsible for managing the integration development process with third-party vendors.
Created github and connected group members to the repository to ensure a smooth workflow.
Collaborated with other developers to identify the most effective and productive methods for enhancing focus on business workflows.

work.summary: Addressed and resolved application bugs, engaged in out-of-province travel for direct user requirement discussions, and played a key role in improving a hotel application to meet user expectations on schedule.
highlights: Resolved bugs in existing projects to ensure the application meets user needs and expectations.
Traveled out of province to interact directly with users and discuss requirements for the project to be developed.
Assisted in enhancing an existing hotel application, ensuring user requirements were met within the specified timeline.

projects.name: Alfamind
projects.summary: Alfamind is an e-commerce platform that provides a wide range of products, from groceries to electronics.

projects.name: Dapur Kita
projects.summary: Dapur Kita is a recipe-sharing platform that allows users to discover and share their favorite recipes.

projects.name: E-Livestock
projects.summary: E-Livestock is a platform that farmers can use to manage their livestock and connect with buyers. It also provides real-time data on the health and location of the animals.

projects.name: GMap Marker
projects.summary: GMap Marker is a code snippet that allows you to add a customer marker to a Google Map.

projects.name: LaraVue Boilerplate
projects.summary: LaraVue is a Laravel and Vue.js starter template that allows you to quickly build web applications.

volunteer.summary: An open-source package that brings the power of modern headless e-commerce functionality to Laravel.

education.summary: I am currently on academic leave and have not continued my studies. My educational journey reached its peak at the end of semester 3, and has not continued since then.

I completed my education in Computer and Network Engineering (TKJ) at a Vocational High School, gaining practical skills in hardware, software, and networking. The program prepared me for a career in information technology or further studies in the field

publications.name: Deploy Next.js with PM2
publications.summary: A guide on how to deploy a Next.js application with PM2.

publications.name: Laravel Mix Code Splitting
publications.summary: A guide on how to code split with Laravel Mix.

interests.name: Trekking
interests.summary: I love trekking and exploring the mountains. I've been to several mountains in Indonesia, and I'm always looking for new adventures.

interests.name: Running
interests.summary: I enjoy running and participating in 10K and 10K. I find it a great way to stay fit and challenge myself. I hope to run a marathon one day.
